name: Honeywell International Inc.
summary: Honeywell International Inc. is a multinational conglomerate that produces a wide variety of commercial and consumer products, aerospace systems, and technologies. The company operates through four business segments: Aerospace Technologies, Honeywell Building Technologies, Performance Materials and Technologies, and Safety and Productivity Solutions. Honeywell's products and services are used in industries such as aviation, building management, industrial automation, and supply chain optimization.
